availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eveline Reiley Shaw on July 1, 1852. Father of Walter Shaw, G. W. Shaw, and Elizabeth Shaw. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, not stated, p. 127. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #unknown, Campbell County Marriages, p. 2. Find A Grave, “Coleman G. Shaw (December 17, 1818-May 14, 1904),” Memorial #62191019, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=62191019 (accessed June 5, 2017).
